title: unesco_heritage_Durmitor_National_Park
text:
Name: Durmitor National Park. short_description:

This breathtaking national park was formed by glaciers and is traversed by rivers and underground streams. Along the Tara river canyon, which has the deepest gorges in Europe, the dense pine forests are interspersed with clear lakes and harbour a wide range of endemic flora.

. date_inscribed: 1980. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 19.0166. latitude: 43.133. area_hectares: 32100. category_long: Natural. category_short: N. Country name: Montenegro. Region: Europe and North America. iso_code: me. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: Bis.
